Office Tepios: Up until very recently, we had managed to stabilize and control each area by occupying the Seed of Infinity. But now the power of Ekimus is again growing strong, and the undead have again awakened and re-occupied both areas. We think Ekimus will be again reach full strength very soon. The Predators of Soul are directly supplying him with energy. Unless they are stopped, the entire Seed will fall into the possession of the undead.
